Header: Essential commodities to low income earners at a concessionary rate
Content: Prime Minister Mahinda Rajapakse stated in parliament that the program to provide essential commodities at a concessionary price to low income earners will commence on the 1st of next month. Prime Minister Mahinda Rajapaksa affirmed that the daily wage of 1000 rupees for estate workers of the plantation sector will come into effect from the 1st of next month. Meanwhile, pages of the forensic audit report that had not been presented to the parliament were tabled today. The Speaker requested all Members of Parliament to be vigilant as some of them contain personal and confidential information. The Speaker also announced COPE and COPA members. Meanwhile, SamanRathnapriya was sworn in as a parliamentarian.
